title: Having trouble binding attack move click to left mouse button

embed.description: EZMODE KITING**, fraug * * * Part I of this post explains why you should use this setup and explains some of the nuances Part II is the...

body:
Using the guide linked, i had bound the attack move click to my left mouse button for some time now, and it was great. Recently, however, I restored my settings (in-game) to default without realizing what it would do before it was too late. Now, I have tried to change it back, but it just will not work in game, even though I am sure i have put the coding (right word?) in correctly. I have even deleted my input.ini folder and let the game make a new one, but that has not worked either.
I need some help fixing it, as it is making it harder to kite and play ranged champion effectively.
Thanks you.

replies.body:
I honestly don't know what the problem with this is... if it helps here is my configured left mouse button attack move **input.ini** file:

[Quickbinds]
evtUseItem4smart=1
evtCastAvatarSpell2smart=1
evtCastAvatarSpell1smart=1
evtCastSpell1smart=1
evtCastSpell4smart=1
evtCastSpell3smart=1
evtUseItem5smart=1
evtUseVisionItemsmart=0
evtCastSpell2smart=1
evtUseItem6smart=1
evtUseItem1smart=1
evtUseItem3smart=1
evtUseItem2smart=1

[GameEvents]
evtOpenShop=[h]
evtPlayerHoldPosition=[<Unbound>]
evtNormalCastSpell1=[a]
evtCameraLockToggle=[Space]
evtCameraSnap=[<Unbound>]
evntPlayerPingCursor=[t]
evtPlayerAttackMove=[<Unbound>]  
evtPlayerAttackMoveClick=[Button 1]  
evtPlayerSelectClick = [Button 3]   
evtOnUIMouse4Pan=[<Unbound>]  

[MouseSettings]  
RollerButtonSpeed = 0  

[HUDEvents]   
evtOnUIMouse1 = [Button 1], [Button 3]   
evtOnUIMouse2 = [Button 2]   
evntHudMoveableSelect = [Button 3]  


I honestly have no problems with this setup and kiting is like a dream. However also understand that to select things (e.g. shop) you have to press the scroll wheel button. Hope this helps :)
